original_title: Mi Familia 2: Class Order Family Tribe
overview: A silent, experimental documentary by Queer/Latino/Native American filmmaker Rob Fatal. The film is comprised entirely of 60 year old 8mm footage created by the filmmaker's matrilineal Native American family as they struggled to survive poverty, racism, and boredom in 1960s Central California.
title: Mi Familia 2: Class Order Family Tribe
